Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: It can be noticed that the HOMO energy level of PzNDTDTBO is 0.15 eV lower than that of PzNDTDTBT , which benefits from the replacement of BT unit by the stronger electron - accepting BO unit due to the stronger electronegativity of oxygen atom than that of sulfur atom.

Let's think step by step.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: It can be noticed that the HOMO energy level of PzNDTDTBO is 0.15 eV lower than that of PzNDTDTBT , which benefits from the replacement of BT unit by the stronger electron - accepting BO unit due to the stronger electronegativity of oxygen atom than that of sulfur atom.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| HOMO energy level of PzNDTDTBO |
| HOMO energy level of PzNDTDTBT |
| electronegativity of oxygen atom |
| electronegativity of sulfur atom |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| HOMO energy level of PzNDTDTBO |
| HOMO energy level of PzNDTDTBT |
| electronegativity of oxygen atom |
| electronegativity of sulfur atom |

Note: HOMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital) energy level is a material property that describes the energy level of the last electron to enter a filled orbital in a molecule or material. Electronegativity is also a material property that describes the tendency of an atom to attract electrons towards itself.
